title: Is the Galaxy M31s a 5G smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, Samsung Galaxy M31s is 4G not a 5G smartphone. Samsung Galaxy M31s is next major smartphone launch will take place on August 5 and it will be the Galaxy Note 20 series. Before that, the Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy M31s in India later this month. This smartphone will succeed the Galaxy M31 which is one of Samsung’s most popular mid-range budget phones. The launch date for Galaxy M31s hasn’t been confirmed yet But it will reportedly by the end of this month.Samsung Galaxy M31s coming soon: Will it's nearly as good as Galaxy M31? also said to go on sale on August 6 via Samsung’s online store and Amazon India.
Galaxy M31s sports Exynos 9611 processor which doesn’t support 5G network. So, it’s a 4G only device.
